mapper.insert: INSERT INTO article_comment (id, content, ARTICLE_ID, MEMBER_ID) VALUES (article_history_id_seq.NEXTVAL, #{content}, #{articleId}, #{memberId});
mapper.select: SELECT ac.id, ac.content, TO_CHAR(ac.regdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') regdate, a.id AS article_Id, m.id AS member_Id FROM ARTICLE_COMMENT ac JOIN article a ON ac.ARTICLE_ID= a.ID JOIN member m ON a.MEMBER_ID = m.ID WHERE a.ID = #{Id, jdbcType=NULL} AND ac.STATUS='enabled' ORDER BY ac.REGDATE DESC
